transcript: of all," he went on, his excitement subsiding under the delightful in- terest of his own story, "is that the sergeant in charge of the cannon which was to give the sig- nal to fire the mines and blow up the bridge, this sergeant, seeing that the French troops were running onto the bridge, was about to fire, but Lannes stayed his hand.
